org.seedstack.crud.rest

Class BaseCrudResource<A extends AggregateRoot<I>,I,D>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.seedstack.crud.rest.BaseResource<A,I,D>
      • org.seedstack.crud.rest.BaseCrudResource<A,I,D>
  • Type Parameters:
    A - the aggregate root type.
    I - the aggregate root identifier type.
    D - the representation type.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    CreateResource<A,I,D>, DeleteResource<A,I,D>, ReadResource<A,I,D>, Resource<A,I,D>, UpdateResource<A,I,D>

    public abstract class BaseCrudResource<A extends AggregateRoot<I>,I,D>
extends BaseResource<A,I,D>
implements CreateResource<A,I,D>, ReadResource<A,I,D>, UpdateResource<A,I,D>, DeleteResource<A,I,D>
    Base class implementing all the CRUD operations. Extend this class when all CRUD operations should be exposed for a particular aggregate/representation couple.
